Group Photo, 1920
Voronsky among Ivanovo delegates to the VIIIth All-Russian Congress of Soviets, Moscow, 1920.
First row: D. A. Furmanov (first from left), M. V. Frunze (third from left). Third row: A. K. Voronsky (second from left).
